name.ca: DigiUnity - Grava i Anota la Pantalla
name.es: DigiUnity - Graba y anota tu pantalla
name.ko: DigiUnity - 화면 녹화 프로그램 & 주석 도구
name.pt_BR: DigiUnity - Grave e faça anotações na tela
name.pt_PT: DigiUnity - Grave o ecrã e faça anotações
name.ru: DigiUnity - Инструмент для записи экрана и аннотаций

short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: The most powerful screen recorder for Chrome. Capture, edit and more.
short.ca: La gravadora més avançada per Chrome. Captura, anota, edita, i molt més.
short.de: Das mächtigste Bildschirmaufnahmewerkzeug für Chrome. Videos aufnehmen, beschriften, bearbeiten und mehr.
short.es: La mejor grabadora para Chrome. Graba tu pantalla, anota, edita, y mucho más.
short.fr: L'enregistreur d'écran le plus puissant pour Chrome. Capture, annote, édite et plus encore
short.it: Lo strumento più potente per registrare lo schermo in Chrome. Registra, modifica e altro ancora.
short.ko: Chrome 확장 중 가장 강력한 화면 녹화 프로그램. 캡쳐, 주석달기, 수정, 그 외.
short.pt_BR: O gravador de tela mais poderoso para Chrome. Capture, anote, edite e muito mais.
short.pt_PT: O gravador de ecrã mais poderoso para Chrome. Capture, anote, edite e muito mais.
short.ru: Самый мощный экранный рекордер для Chrome. Захватывайте, комментируйте, редактируйте и многое другое.
short.ta: Chrome க்கான மிக சக்திவாய்ந்த திரை ரெக்கார்டர். பதிவுசெய்தல், சிறுகுறிப்பு, திருத்துதல் மற்றும் பல..
short.zh_CN: Chrome 最强大的屏幕录像机。 捕获，注释，编辑等。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Unleash the potential of your organisation.

DigiUnity is the employees platform for smart and engaging knowledge sharing.

Show, tell and share in DigiUnity

Make videos with recordings of your screen, camera or both. It's faster than typing and more efficient than online meetings.

The videos can also be easily shared outside the company, for example to your customers and partners.
long.ca,de,es,fr,it,ko,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru,ta,zh_C:
Show, tell and share in DigiUnity

Make videos with recordings of your screen, camera or both. It's faster than typing and more efficient than online meetings.

The videos can also be easily shared outside the company, for example to your customers and partners.
